item.description:
Join us for the invigorating, playful and deep practice of laughter yoga.  

Combining laughter, breathing and movement, we will experience the joy of intentional laughter.  Laughter Yoga is based on the research that our bodies cannot tell the difference between real and intentional laughter.  All we need is to be willing to breathe and laugh which creates a shift in our body chemistry.    

You do not need mats or special clothing.  Dress comfortably and come as you are.  All abilities welcome.

 

By Donation to Sadhana- $5-15 suggested donation
item.how_to_find_us: go to the castle and head to the ground floor
item.name: PORTLAND LAUGHTER CLUB w/Maine Laughter Yoga
